ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. J. Edward Richard ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. J. EDWARD RICHARD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of the Northwest Territories, effective May 1, 2012.
